Adobe typefaces tend to have between 500 and 1000 {phrase}kerning pairs{/phrase}. The El Cheapo font that you downloaded for free from the Web may not have any.

With the spacing set up (accounting for wider letters like M and W) I started {wi}kerning{/wi}. This was a massively painstaking process.
